sentences.en: Basketball fans miss Magic Johnson's razzle - dazzle in the game.
sentences.cn: 篮球迷们怀念魔术师 强纳 生球赛中的花招.

sentences.en: Bob is such a good player that he doesn't have to add razzle - dazzle to his game.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃的球技好,用不着在打球时故意来些花哨的玩意以引人注意.

sentences.en: Despite a lot of razzle - dazzle , the home - town basketball team has been beat by 20 points.
sentences.cn: 当地的篮球队尽管有许多迷惑人的假动作, 但仍以20分之差被打败.

sentences.en: Despite a lot of razzle - dazzle, the home - town basketball team is beat by 20 point.
sentences.cn: 当地的篮球队尽管有许多迷惑人的假动作, 但仍以20分之差被打败.

sentences.en: He razzle - dazzled girls in basketball.
sentences.cn: 他打篮球时,使姑娘们眼花缭乱.

sentences.en: Special just didn't have enough razzle dazzle to describe your birthday.
sentences.cn: “特殊 ” 二字无法尽述你生日的五光十色.

sentences.en: The crowd went crazy over the razzle - dazzle play by the rookie guard.
sentences.cn: 人们因新防卫队员的精彩表演而变得如醉如痴.

sentences.en: The first team beat Sunderland 2 - 0 with comfort but little razzle.
sentences.cn: 成年队 2-0 轻取桑德兰但有点混乱.

sentences.en: The new Star Wars movie has lots of technical razzle - dazzle.
sentences.cn: 新电影《星际大战》中有很多技术特技.

sentences.en: They are complaining about the lack of much razzle - dazzle in modern football.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨现代足球中缺乏使对方眼花缭乱的球艺.

trans.tran_cn: <俚>哄闹，狂饮喧闹，（娱乐场的）晕旋转台
